channel.title: [Pi] Working doors :(
channel.description:
The doors .cfg is confusing the hell out of me and the tut on it is also very confusing. Could somebody give me a few examples of how to make it work please? Like one for north, east, west, south. Thanks, just something simple to put in the actionhandler or even better a tut adding a good doors system. Found a few but I'm missing a lot of methods and so forth.
Thanks in advance for the help. Only want this for opening a few doors in main areas I'm going to put into the server. So far 0 working doors, wooo! haha

item.title: [Pi] Working doors :(
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:6, topic:446329”][quote author=mr extremez link=topic=549195.msg4026130#msg4026130 date=1340334157]
I don’t know if you want this, but this is the system I use. It just deletes the door.

case "put your ID in here and remove the "s": c.getPA().object(-1, obX, obY, 0, 0); //Delete Door new Object(-1, c.objectX, c.objectY, c.heightLevel, 0, 10, -1, 0); break;
[/quote]
Modified it, you capital c. Thanks, works a treat! Was about to go crazy haha.[/quote]No problem.

Read full topic
